title: Improve Digital Adapter Params
description: A schema which validates params accepted by Improve Digital adapter

placementId.description: An ID which identifies this placement of the impression

publisherId.description: An ID which identifies publisher. Required when using a placementKey

placementKey.description: An uniq name which identifies this placement of the impression. Must be used with publisherId

keyValues.description: Contains one or more key-value pairings for key-value targeting
